Experiment Method.Assay Method: Kinase activity assay and autophagy measurement

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were used to study the effects of LRRK2 variants on kinase activity and autophagy.

Readout description.Result Description: The LRRK2 p.G2019S variant significantly increased kinase activity and impaired autophagy.
The LRRK2 p.R1441C variant showed similar effects on kinase activity and autophagy as p.G2019S.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare group means.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 10% of wild-type levels; autophagy activity above 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 30% of wild-type levels; autophagy activity below 50% of wild-type levels.
